content: In the fiscal â23 first quarter, Lifecore grew revenue by 8% to $23.7 million, generating an increase of 8.1% in adjusted EBITDA to $2.5 million both of which were consistent with our plan and the cadence that we disclosed at the beginning of the fiscal year. Shifting to our fiscal â23 outlook for our Lifecore segment, we are reiterating revenue guidance in the range of $122 million to $126 million, which implies growth in the range of 12% to 15% and adjusted EBITDA guidance in the range of $31 million to $32.5 million, which implies growth in the range of 7% to 12%.
